game.name: Royal Quest Online
game.genres: Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, In-App Purchases, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Touch Only Option
game.shortDescription: 판타지가 살아 숨 쉬는 광활하고 편안한 무료 플레이 MMORPG! 4개의 클래스와 8개의 하위 클래스에서 선택하고, 수백 개의 지역을 탐험하고, 수천 개의 퀘스트를 진행하고, 다양한 PvE 모드와 도전적인 PvP 모드를 플레이하고, 독특하고 역동적인 세계에 발을 들이고, 다른 플레이어와 거래하세요. 플레이하고 탐험하고 싸워 승리를 쟁취하세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fantasy comes alive in this vast yet cozy free-to-play MMORPG! Choose between 4 classes and 8 subclasses, explore hundreds of locations, thousands of quests, dive into varied PvE and PvP modes, enter the unique vibrant world, and trade with other players. Play, explore, fight and be victorious!

reviewHighlights.text: There is no pvp content, since 2012 the game remain the same. there is no updates or sonething new. 10 years ago game was popular and you could go to...
It's an mid game for me, there is a chance of me coming back to it and playing it another day, but it doesn't hold my attention for long. I still reco...
